title: 9/1! Studio w/ Alcove; No Broker Fee/Security Deposit; HT/HW Included
app_fee: $15/Person Application Fee for Credit Check, Processing, Etc.
posting_body: Oversized Brighton first-floor studio apartment with bonus alcove/office space available September 1st!
No broker fee, no security deposit and heat/hot water included in rent.
** Virtual tour and online/remote leasing process available **
Call, text or email Gil regarding this apartment or your overall home search.
We have apartments all over Greater Boston.
DISCLAIMER: Information given in advertisements reflects info from the property manager.
Neither the posting agent or PadMatch Realty is responsible for any inaccuracies.
The presence of this advertisement is not a guarantee that the advertised property is still available.

PadMatch, Inc makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.
Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.
